column5: Minutes from U of H and TSU, downtown, Hobby Airport and Beltway 8. Cozy 2 bedroom 1.5 Bath Town home right in front of the pool. Quiet, discreet gated community, with patio & covered porch, equipped W/D , BBQ smoker, Wifi & Netflix Friendly Neighbors, lrge 12'x13' room with large wall long closet, neatly furnished.
